table.name: vtiger_mgchauffeurs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mgchauffeurs` ( `mgchauffeursid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `actif` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `phone_mobile` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `email` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `uicolor` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `mgtypechauffeur` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mgchauffeursid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_mgchauffeurscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mgchauffeurscf` ( `mgchauffeursid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mgchauffeursid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
